headerTop.leftMainTitle:
Sell us your
smartphones, tablets & Mac computers
headerTop.leftMainDesc: You can sell your smartphone (e.g., Apple iPhone and Samsung Galaxy), Mac computer, and tablet at fair prices with us. Use our price calculator for an immediate sale offer!
headerTop.rightMainTitle: Buy new and used iPhones, iPads, Macbooks, etc., from us
headerTop.rightMainDesc: You will find a wide selection of used and new iPhones, Samsung Galaxy, Huawei, Macbooks, iPads, and other devices at fair prices including at least 1 year of warranty.

mainPage.section1.subTitle: You're going to love this
mainPage.section2.bottomTitle: Sell your smartphone, tablet, and Mac computer
mainPage.section2.bottomDesc: Sell your used device! Calculate the price, send it in for free or drop it off, receive express payout!
whyWeAre.subTitle: Our Strengths
whyWeAre.desc1: We pay you the amount express after inspecting your device.
whyWeAre.desc2: You receive at least 1 year warranty on all purchased devices.
whyWeAre.desc3: Our online support assistant Remo is happy to help with the purchasing and selling process of your device. We are also available for live chat during our office hours.
whyWeAre.desc4: All devices offered for sale are tested, cleaned, and refurbished according to strict guidelines.
howItWorks.subTitle: How It Works
howItWorks.mainTitle: Buy and Sell Smartphones, Tablets, and Mac Computers.
howItWorks.desc1: Select the condition of your device to get an immediate fair purchase price.
howItWorks.desc2: Send your device for free with the prepaid shipping label by mail.
howItWorks.desc3: After inspecting your device, the amount will be paid out express.
howItWorks.desc4: Choose from our versatile selection a device that meets your needs and pay a top price
howItWorks.desc5: All devices are in stock and will be shipped directly to your home in no time
howItWorks.desc6: Remarket offers at least 1 year warranty, as well as a 14-day return policy on all purchased devices
customerAboutUs.subTitle: Customer Opinions
contactPage.h1FormRightSidePleaseRead: Please read and accept the privacy policy.
newsLetterBox.mainTitle: We are celebrating our 10th anniversary - Celebrate with us!
newsLetterBox.descriptionPart4: . This voucher cannot be combined with other promotions/discounts.
newsLetterBox.subtitle: We will never share your data with third parties.
basketPage.paymentDescription1: Benefit from 0% interest and conveniently pay by invoice after receiving your goods. Payment is made by scanning the QR code on the payment slip you receive by email from Ideal Payment. This requires successful verification by the provider. The amount is due within 14 days.
basketPage.paymentTitle2: Installment Payment up to 3 Months (Ideal Payment)
basketPage.paymentDescription2: Enjoy 0% interest and pay comfortably in up to 3 installments after receiving your goods. The due dates are staggered: 1st installment after 10 days, 2nd installment after 40 days, and the 3rd installment after 70 days. After successful provider verification, Ideal Payment will immediately send you the payment slip via email.
basketPage.paymentTitle3Part3: up to 12 Months (Debit and Credit Cards) - HeidiPay
basketPage.paymentDescription3: Benefit from 0% interest and choose a convenient payment in 3, 6, or even 12 monthly installments. The first installment is due immediately. You can easily pay with your debit or credit card.
basketPage.paymentDescription4: 0% Fees - Pay quickly and securely with your Visa debit or credit card. Your order is triggered immediately after the card provider's verification.
basketPage.paymentDescription5: 0% Fees - Pay quickly and securely with your Mastercard debit or credit card. Your order is triggered immediately after the card provider's verification.
basketPage.paymentDescription6: 0% Fees - Pay quickly and securely with your American Express credit card. Your order is triggered immediately after the card provider's verification.
basketPage.paymentDescription7: 0% Fees - With the Postcard, the amount is directly debited from your PostFinance account, and the order is triggered immediately.
basketPage.paymentDescription8: 0% Fees - Pay quickly and securely with the TWINT Wallet. Your order is triggered immediately after the card provider's verification.
basketPage.paymentDescription9: 0% Fees - With Immediate Transfer, the amount is directly debited from your bank account, and the order is triggered immediately.
basketPage.paymentDescription10: 0% Fees - With Apple Pay, you conveniently pay directly via your Apple device and the order is triggered immediately.
basketPage.paymentDescription11: 0% Fees - With Samsung Pay, you conveniently pay directly via your Samsung smartphone/tablet and the order is triggered immediately.
basketPage.paymentDescription12: 0% Fees - With PayPal, the amount is directly debited from your PayPal account or credit card, and the order is triggered immediately.
basketPage.paymentDescription13: 0% Fees - When paying via bank transfer, we will send you the payment information by email. Goods are shipped only after payment is received. Payment must be made within 3 working days, otherwise, the order will be cancelled.
basketPage.squareDesign2:
1 year warranty on used items
2 years warranty on new devices
